name: pi-sip-alarm
description: Raspberry PI Service configurable to call and alarm people, when certain pins on the PI are activated
author: Johannes Garz <jojogarz123@gmail.com> (https://www.garz.tech/)

scripts.install-all: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.dev: cd pjcall && make && cd .. && npx concurrently -k "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd pjcall && make && cd ../client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
